amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 115-679 to add invasive vegetation to Section 602 of the Healthy Forests Restoration Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A037) offered by Ms. Stefanik.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
